doc.field: Bert Hansen collection of advertising fans
Bert Hansen collection of advertising fans
BH-019. Antique tri-fold expandable around a metal grommet
BH-019. Antique tri-fold expandable around a metal grommet

Vase shape when closed. Color painting of rural scene centered on farmhouse with smoke rising from the chimney in autumn. Main text on back appears to be from a women's apparel shop, Hartley's, in Miami, but that might be fiction as it is clearly a printer's sample since it has prices for fans in bulk. Printer: U.O. Colson Co.
